1518509680_1L4dZcDF2maSKHDy788yhxpYnBWnX.body: I think it is possible. It is matter what you call a site. A single domain name is centralized by the DNS, but it can be only one of the many entry points to a decentralized data structure like some sort of blockchain. The matrix protocol currently is very close to it: its rooms a quite decentralized while servers are still centralized as any usual site.
